original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest was to be chief over the chiefs of the Levites, and to have oversight of those who kept guard over the sanctuary.
korean_text: 제사장 아론의 아들 엘르아살은 레위인의 지휘관들의 어른이 되고 또 성소를 맡을 자를 통할할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest
was to be chief over the chiefs of the Levites
and to have oversight of those
who kept guard over the sanctuary
